title: For all the little stuff mods remove. They seem to give Nubrac a pass
body: He constantly posted his streams and videos in general discussion. Yet for some reason, they always stay and are never removed and he is never punished for this offense. Yet the mods seem perfectly content with removing small posts or jabs at other players. Are you guys afraid to remove any of his posts like what's the big deal? The comments on his threads mention it every time.
